mapper.select: select g.gradelevel level, g.name gradeName, g.min_price minPrice, g.max_price maxPrice,count(m.gradeid) memCnt from member m, grade g where m.gradeid = g.gradeid group by g.gradeid, g.name, g.min_price, g.max_price, g.gradelevel order by g.gradelevel
select count(p.sub_id), sc.sub_name from product p right outer join sub_category sc on p.sub_id = sc.sub_id where sc.main_id='m0002' group by p.sub_id, sc.sub_name, sc.sub_id order by sc.sub_id
